name: Hard Hat Harvest
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 52

Direct the Blobbies to work together to harvest raw materials, manufacture components, and then deliver their finished hats to the depot before it’s too late! Build the Little Hat Factory to hire Blobbies and outfit them with their own hats so they can get to work. Blobbies like to deliver to the place closest to them, depending on what they’re holding, so they’ll need close supervision. Some buildings may need to be relocated to allow the Blobbies to work effectively. Each successful delivery resets the clock and a new order comes in, but the delivery window decreases each time. See how long you can keep up!

If gameplay feels a little slow or fast, adjust the play speed to either get the Blobbies movin’ faster, pause the clock, or to slow ‘em down so nobody gets dizzy. Music volume can also be adjusted in the menu.

For better performance, use a native build rather than the web version. If running in browser, runs best in chrome/chromium. In the web version, there may be some audio stuttering at low frame rates.

All assets were created for, and after the start of the game jam.
